page.title: 02HOUSES IN THE 1980's
page.content: There are lots of different kinds of houses in which we live. The shapes are different,they may be bigger or smaller or have more rooms _ but they are all made the same way. All houses are made of{BRICK.Brick}is made of clay,fine sand and lime.The house is supported by a concrete footing.The windows are made of{glass, the frame is made of{wood.}some houses have double_glazing -two windows,one infront the other.This makes it warmer and quieter.The roof is tiled.{Tiles} are baked clay.They overlap the one below them and they are all tilted to let the water drain away.The frame is made of{wood.}the house contains many luxuries.Television,radio,chairs,table s.cooker,sink,fridge,freezer,bed,lamp, lights and heating,to keep you warm, comfortable or amused.The house protects you.
